title: So in style
text:
Home » travel » So in style GETAWAYS THE NATION August 14, 2015 1:00 am 
Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort invites you to indulge yourself with a Thai-style retreat and a Wellbeing Package at So SPA ... KRABI So in style Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort invites you to indulge yourself with a Thai-style retreat and a Wellbeing Package at So SPA with L'Occitane. Start with a relaxing 30-minute Jacuzzi Bath to improve the circulation, followed by a 60-minute Body Scrub to moisturise your skin. The Wellbeing Package ends with a 60-minute Relaxing Aromachologies to leave you feeling totally rejuvenated. Rates are Bt3,500 for one and Bt6,500 for a couple and the package is on offer through the end of September. Call (075) 627 800 or e-mail: h6184-th@sofitel.com. PHUKET Barefoot in the board room Five-star resort Indigo Pearl has introduced Green Season Meetings, a unique art-themed interpretation of meetings, incentives, conventions and events that takes delegates out of the boardroom and gives new meaning to the "art of the deal". Tailored to the needs of each group, Green Season Meetings immerse delegates in lush tropical landscapes. Visit Indigo-Pearl.com or e-mail: lalida@indigo-pearl.com. HUA HIN Luxury on the cheap Stay at the 5-star Hotel de la Paix, Hua Hin before August 31 and you'll receive a 30-per-cent discount on Best Available Rates, the same discount on the dinner menu at Motion and Clouds Loft plus a 50-per-cent discount on any 90-minute spa treatment. Book 3 consecutive nights in a Horizon Studio and receive a free upgrade to a Garden Terrace Room. Book online at www.hoteldelapaixhh.com. Call (032) 709 555 or e-mail: book@hoteldelapaixhh.com Nationwide and beyond Living it up with mum Celebrate with your beloved mother all this month with Dusit Hotels and Resorts "Bond with Mum" package. The perfect way to spoil mum on her special day, the package includes a guaranteed room upgrade upon check-in and a potted jasmine plant or hand garland, the symbol of maternal love. You'll also enjoy buy-one-get-one spa treatments throughout your stay, as well as complimentary buffet dinner for mum and daily breakfast for two. Guests who have booked the "Bond with Mum" package also stand a chance to win a free return stay by posting a photo from their visit by August 31. Entries must include the hashtags #CurrentGuest and #BondwithMum2015. Winners will be announced by first week of September. Visit Facebook.com/dusitinternational to participate. Book online at http://www.Dusit.com/specialoffers/bond-with-mum. Airlines Thai Airways International (THAI) has introduced "Let's Go to Europe" promotional fares for a minimum of two adults and "Europe 4 Friends" promotional fares for a minimum of four adults. The "Let's Go to Europe" offer covers travel on the Bangkok to London flight TG916 starting at Bt31,610 per person, the Bangkok to Frankfurt on flight TG922 starting at Bt28,625 and other routes starting at Bt30,490. "Europe 4 Friends" starts at Bt29,440 per person on THAI-operated flights from Bangkok to London, Paris, Frankfurt, Munich, Zurich, Rome, Milan, Brussels, Oslo, Copenhagen or Stockholm. Bookings must be made before December 31, with travel commencing between October 1 to March 31. Discounts on the Bangkok to London on flight TG916 and Bangkok to Frankfurt on flight TG922 only be used for travel between October 25 and December 19. Visit any THAI ticketing office or call (02) 356 1111 (24 hours a day). Visit www.ThaiAirways.com. Hanoi Tastes like Apricot The first hotel in Vietnam to strike a delicate blend between locally renowned art and hospitality, Apricot Hotel is Hanoi's latest new small luxury accommodation hub. Located merely steps away from the city's iconic Hoan Kiem lake, Apricot pays homage to Vietnam's finest artists by showcasing original artwork. The introductory rate starts at US$110 for single occupancy with American breakfast and wireless Internet access and is valid from now until August 31. Book online at www.ApricotHotels.com. 284 Viewed
